alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 9:34AM PST until January 18 at 11:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 10 inches. * WHERE...East Slopes of the Washington Cascades. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow accumulations are expected along I-90 over Snoqualmie Pass.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Washington Cascades
